Articles.Content:
It's hard to make a cinematic video with the game. So, I thought, "it might be easier to recreate everything on illustrator and after effect ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) " .

**One small jump for a Kerbale** 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HIhsai6sCiY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![3AIhLza.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3AIhLza.jpg)

New film!

**Rescue Mission(s)**

[youtu.be/71xrhQ-XjCU](youtu.be/71xrhQ-XjCU)

![RQtipfn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RQtipfn.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T23:44:56Z" title="06/27/2015 11:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Tom Robin**

Very nice animation! I like how at the end, Valentina comes out and plants a flag after only a small jump.

-Carlpilot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
That is so cool! Nice work. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
This is really cool great work! I love it so much ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (all the reps for you)
Looks really good, I like how it is Valentina that comes out at the end! Great work! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thank you all! Here a closer look at Valentina in her EVA suit 

![valentina_kerbal_eva_by_tom_robin-d8njltj.gif](http://orig11.deviantart.net/a84c/f/2015/088/3/c/valentina_kerbal_eva_by_tom_robin-d8njltj.gif)

Here's my new little cartoon.
